file_content.text: Come on, don't be shy! Get up there!
I'm fine down here, thank you.
Aw, don't be like that. You're one of us now! It's a squad tradition!
You're saying you've all cavorted around on stage like a bunch of loons?
If we say "yes," will you do it?
No, but it'll make for an interesting report to the commander.
